Container.Name: Rclone
Container.Overview: Docker for Rclone - a command line program to sync files and directories to and from various cloud services.
Container.Description: Docker for Rclone - a command line program to sync files and directories to and from various cloud services. [br][br] [b][u][span style='color: #E80000;']Configuration[/span][/u][/b][br] [b]/config[/b] The path to the data which should be backed up by Rclone[br] [b]/data[/b] The path to the data which should be backed up by Rclone[br] [b]SYNC_DESTINATION[/b] The destination that the data should be backed up to (must be the same name as specified in .rclone.conf)[br]

Config.Name: Config Path
Config.Description: The path where the .rclone.conf file is

Config.Name: Data Path
Config.Description: The path to the data which should be backed up by Rclone

Config.Name: Sync Destination
Config.Description: The destination that the data should be backed up to (must be the same name as specified in .rclone.conf)

Config.Name: Sync Destination Subpath
Config.Description: If the data should be backed up to a subpath on the destionation (will automaticly be created if it does not exist)
